function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection of personal data through face scanners and IoT devices raises privacy concerns and potential misuse of data","Impact":"Loss of privacy, potential discrimination, and unauthorized use of personal information","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy policies, obtain consent for data collection, and regularly audit and monitor data usage","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization techniques, and data access control mechanisms","People":"General public, individuals using public spaces, and users of IoT devices","Owner":"Government authorities, technology companies, and data protection agencies"},{"Description":"Reliance on machine learning and AI models for disease prediction may lead to inaccuracies and false predictions","Impact":"Misinformation, misallocation of resources, and ineffective response measures","Mitigation":"Continuous validation and refinement of AI models, cross-validation with traditional epidemiological methods, and expert input in model development","Technologies":"Cross-validation techniques, expert validation, and ensemble learning methods","People":"Health authorities, decision makers, and data scientists","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions, and AI technology developers"},{"Description":"Potential misuse of voice recognition apps and AI models for discrimination and stigmatization of individuals","Impact":"Social stigma, discrimination, and potential harm to individuals' reputation and rights","Mitigation":"Ethical guidelines for AI and voice recognition usage, biased dataset review, and regular audits for fairness and non-discrimination","Technologies":"Ethical AI frameworks, fairness evaluation metrics, and bias mitigation techniques","People":"Individuals providing voice samples, healthcare professionals, and AI developers","Owner":"AI ethics committees, healthcare organizations, and regulatory bodies"}]}
